h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Daoist Mi
content: The Daoist Mi is a stronger version of the Sword Daoists you've encountered all over the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Despite being stronger, he's still kind of a pushover, as he doesn't boast much more than your average enemy, even with two distinct phases.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Daoist Mi'.
The content is as follows:
The Daoist Mi is a stronger version of the Sword Daoists you've encountered all over the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Despite being stronger, he's still kind of a pushover, as he doesn't boast much more than your average enemy, even with two distinct phases.
